tool.name: OSMGPSymbolizer

param.name: in_osmfeaturedataset
param.dialogReference: Input feature dataset containing the point, line, and polygonal OSM feature classes.
param.pythonReference: Input feature dataset containing the point, line, and polygonal OSM feature classes.

param.name: in_osmpoints_layer
param.dialogReference: Template group layer containing the symbology and edit templates for the OSM point features
param.pythonReference: Template group layer containing the symbology and edit templates for the OSM point features

param.name: in_osmlines_layer
param.dialogReference: Template group layer containing the symbology and edit templates for the OSM line features
param.pythonReference: Template group layer containing the symbology and edit templates for the OSM line features

param.name: in_osmpolygons_layer
param.dialogReference: Template group layer containing the symbology and edit templates for the OSM polygon features
param.pythonReference: Template group layer containing the symbology and edit templates for the OSM polygon features

param.name: out_osmpoints_layer
param.dialogReference: Group layer containing the symbology and the edit templates from the input template layer but now referencing the point feature class from the specific OSM feature dataset.
param.pythonReference: Group layer containing the symbology and the edit templates from the input template layer but now referencing the point feature class from the specific OSM feature dataset.

param.name: out_osmlines_layer
param.dialogReference: Group layer containing the symbology and the edit templates from the input template layer but now referencing the line feature class from the specific OSM feature dataset.
param.pythonReference: Group layer containing the symbology and the edit templates from the input template layer but now referencing the line feature class from the specific OSM feature dataset.

param.name: out_osmpolygons_layer
param.dialogReference: Group layer containing the symbology and the edit templates from the input template layer but now referencing the polygon feature class from the specific OSM feature dataset.
param.pythonReference: Group layer containing the symbology and the edit templates from the input template layer but now referencing the polygon feature class from the specific OSM feature dataset.

tool.summary: This tool takes layer templates and applies them to downloaded OSM feature classes.
tool.usage: • The input template layer are user created group layers containing symbology and edit templates for the editor environment.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool takes layer templates and applies them to downloaded OSM feature classes.
This tool takes layer templates and applies them to downloaded OSM feature classes.
